name: FLICK SOLITAIRE
description:
Solitaire, the classic patience game you love to relax with. Now reinvented for touch with an amazing new “Flick” mechanic. Finally solitaire feels like playing with real cards but magical and beautiful!
Launching with 3 solitaire variations to enjoy:
• Classic Solitaire (a.k.a. Patience or Klondike) - play “Deal 1” or “Deal 3”.
• Pyramid Solitaire - Can you clear the pyramid by matching pairs?
• Elevens - A fast paced solitaire variation you might just love.
All with 3 different difficulties to unwind your mind or challenge your brain :-).
We’re committed to bringing you the best and most beautiful solitaire game available anywhere. We are working with amazing artists from around the world to bring you new cards and surfaces to play with monthly. Gorgeous new designs coming soon!
Features:
• 100% solvable levels guaranteed - can you beat them all?
• Advanced hint system gives you multiple hints!
• Grid mode - view all the games you’ve played and retry any of them.
• Use a ‘key’ to unlock the solution to a level.

Let us know what solitaire variation you’d love to see next: Spider, FreeCell, Clock Patience or something special to you? #

Made with love in England by just 2 people and our artist friends.
Need help, just get in touch: feedback@flick.games
